Lauren Feldon
Content Strategy Manager at Incipio Group
August 28, 2014, Justina managed Lauren directly

As the social media + publicity coordinator at Agency GLOW, Lauren has taken lead on various client projects requiring a sense of creativity, organization and leadership. She has taken on tasks beyond her job description and delivered above and beyond expectations. Our goal is to see Lauren grow and blossom within Agency GLOW or beyond. It is with pleasure that we would recommend Lauren to any future employer offering an opportunity for Lauren to learn from and ultimately contribute to a growing organization or client base.

summary: Following a decade of marketing experience at large-scale agencies such as Y&R Brands, Wunderman, Fuse Interactive and RAPP, combined with global marketing roles at Oakley and Burton, Agency GLOW Co-Founder and current Forte Mare Founder Justina Rapala brings forth an honest perspective and globally relevant strategy to the modern-day integrated marketing practice. Personal Accomplishments:  •	Successful integrated marketing management of national and international brand and product           launches. •	Lead Marketing Manager for Oakley's activation at 2008 Summer Olympic Games in          Beijing, China and 2010 Winter Olympic Games in Vancouver, Canada•	Completion of Master of Business and Communication program with the highest honors         Summa Cum Laude.•	Honorary member of Kappa Tau Alpha, National Honor Society in Journalism and Mass         Communication.
name: Justina Rapala Nielsen M.B.A
